name: Hidden Element
description:
An important button is hidden with display:none.

Task: What CSS property value would make it visible?
hints: display:none completely hides elements
Common visible values: block, inline-block, flex

name: Z-Index Trap
description:
A modal is appearing behind the content instead of on top.

Task: Fix the z-index value (must be higher than 100)
hints: z-index only works on positioned elements
Use a value above 100 to appear on top

name: Overflow Hidden
description:
Content is cut off because the container has overflow:hidden.

Task: What overflow value shows scrollbars when needed?
hints: overflow:hidden clips content beyond the box
Use 'auto' for automatic scrollbars or 'scroll' for always-visible bars

name: Flexbox Center
description:
Items won't center in a flexbox container.

Task: Add the missing property to center items both ways
hints: justify-content handles horizontal alignment in flex
align-items handles vertical alignment

name: Grid Column Span
description:
An element should span 2 columns but only takes 1.

Task: Add the correct grid-column property
hints: Use grid-column to control column spanning
Syntax: grid-column: span 2 or grid-column: 1 / 3

name: Hover State
description:
A link should turn red on hover but doesn't work.

Task: Fix the pseudo-class selector
hints: Pseudo-classes use a colon, not a dot
The correct syntax is a:hover

name: Animation Delay
description:
An animation should start after 2 seconds but starts immediately.

Task: Add the correct animation-delay property
hints: animation-delay controls when animation starts
Use: animation-delay: 2s

name: Color Contrast
description:
Text is unreadable: light gray on white background.

Task: Provide a color value with better contrast (dark color)
hints: Light colors on light backgrounds fail accessibility
Use dark colors like #333, #000, or black

name: Media Query Bug
description:
Mobile styles aren't applying because the media query is wrong.

Task: Fix the max-width syntax
hints: Media query conditions need a colon
Correct: @media (max-width: 768px)

name: Position Absolute
description:
An absolutely positioned element isn't relative to its parent.

Task: What position value should the parent have?
hints: Absolute elements position relative to nearest positioned ancestor
Parent needs position: relative

name: Box Sizing
description:
Element width calculation includes padding, breaking the layout.

Task: Add box-sizing property to fix this
hints: Default box model adds padding to width
Use box-sizing: border-box to include padding in width

name: Specificity War
description:
A class style is being overridden by a tag selector. Both have color rules.

Task: How do you make the class selector more specific? (Hint: !important)
hints: !important overrides normal specificity
Add !important after the value

name: Margin Collapse
description:
Two adjacent divs have 20px margin each, but only 20px space between them.

Task: What CSS property on the parent prevents margin collapse?
hints: Margin collapse happens with adjacent vertical margins
Overflow, flex, or grid on parent prevents it

name: Viewport Units
description:
A hero section should be full viewport height but isn't.

Task: Use the correct viewport unit for height
hints: Percentage height needs parent height defined
Viewport height unit: vh (100vh = full viewport)

name: Transform Origin
description:
A rotation should pivot from the top-left corner but pivots from center.

Task: Set the correct transform-origin
hints: Default transform-origin is center
Use: transform-origin: top left

name: CSS Variable
description:
A color variable is defined but not being used correctly.

Task: Fix the syntax to use the CSS variable
hints: CSS variables must be used with var() function
Syntax: var(--variable-name)

name: Gradient Direction
description:
A gradient should go from left to right but goes top to bottom.

Task: Fix the gradient direction
hints: Default gradient is top to bottom (to bottom)
Use 'to right' or '90deg' for left to right

name: Aspect Ratio
description:
An image container should maintain 16:9 ratio but doesn't.

Task: Add the aspect-ratio property
hints: Modern CSS has aspect-ratio property
Syntax: aspect-ratio: 16 / 9

name: Calc Function
description:
A width should be 100% minus 50px but the calc is broken.

Task: Fix the calc() syntax
hints: calc() requires units on all values
Fix: calc(100% - 50px)

name: Grid Template Areas
description:
A complex layout using grid-template-areas has a typo.

Task: The header area name is misspelled - what should it be?
hints: Look at the first row - there's a spelling error
The correct spelling is 'header'
